title: Magic Whooshes Sounds (spells)
description: 576 High-Quality magic whooshes spells sounds (288 as the original version of the sound, 288 with an echo enhancement to make the sound more interesting).
longDescription:
Magic Whooshes Sounds (spells)

576 High-Quality magic whooshes spells sounds (288 as the original version of the sound, 288 with an echo enhancement to make the sound more interesting).


🔊 YouTube Preview - Listen to the sounds through a video

📜 Tracklist PDF


Types of whooshes:

- Elemental (fire, ice, air, water, earth)

- Sci-Fi / Energy

- Dark/Shadow/Ghostly

- Cinematic

- Holy/Heal/Light

- Extra: Insect, Metallic, Special, Curious


This pack can be complemented with:

- Magic Sounds (Bundle Collection)

- Combat Sounds (Bundle Collection)


More about the pack:

- Editable: Easy to generate more sounds if you alter pitch.

- Intuitive file naming.

- Very easy to implement in your game.

- Put more life to your game with this magic spells.

- A very good resource for magic sounds at a good price.

- You can use the original version and the echo enhancement together to create variations of the same spell.
technicalDetails:
Number of Audio Waves: 576

Number of Audio Cues: 576

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz / 16 bit

Minutes of audio provided: 33 minutes and 56 seconds
